section.title: <xar:if />
section.t: Contains template code processed if the condition evaluates to true. The value of Condition is a php expression.

t.t: A php an expression evaluating to false or true. When it evaluates to true, the children of this element are processed. For comparison operators refer to the note on logic tags

list.t:
[inline] {true|(false)} Defaulting to false, this attribute specifies whether the condition should be in assignable (inline) form. This correspond to the php expression : (condition ? truepart:falsepart)
Note: this attribute is not implemented yet

t.artwork:
<xar:if condition="$func eq 'editStory'">
  // stuff
<xar:elseif condition="$func eq 'saveStory'" />
  //more stuff
<xar:elseif condition="$func eq 'viewStory'" />
  //still more stuff
<xar:else />
  //even more stuff
</xar:if>
